Name: Sophica - Temples Of Mystery
About the game: Sophica: Temples Of Mystery, is a First Person, Puzzle Platformer. You wake up in your bed, look outside to see that you are among the clouds. 《Is this a dream?》 You continue forward to see what this is about, the mystery lies ahead... Easy to play, but hard to master. Can you make it trough all the levels? Implemented Features: Crouching Sprinting Double jump Menu working with gamepad Game also playable with gamepad Save and load game system Checkpoint system Interactive level design (pick up boxes, events, etc.) Diverse and unique levels Beautiful and relaxing music Relaxed gameplay, no timing, no score etc. Planned Features after release: More games to come in the future based on the same game, but with unique levels and evolved gameplay: - Level selection - Procedural levels - Create your own levels - Swimming system - More ways to interract - Bigger and different puzzles - Reward systems - Complex gravity system for different gravity types and rotating gravity
